div.p: Being sort of freelance and self-employed it can be being in a school one day and then in the evening being on-call and
going down to the police station to be an appropriate adult for a young person who’s in custody, to maybe going down to the hospital
where one of my young people may have self-harmed or took an overdose, to going to multi-agency meetings with leading professionals
apart from myself so yeah it’s quite a mixture so when people say 9-5 it’s like no I don’t know what that is!
